entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
